source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_00<tab>Collys, a reporter for the <var 1A 02 /var>Harbor Herald<var 1A 01 /var>, would ask your aid in securing an interview.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

リムサ・ロミンサのコリーズは、困っているようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_01<tab>Collys, a reporter for the <var 1A 02 /var>Harbor Herald<var 1A 01 /var>, is having a difficult time learning the details of this year's Starlight Celebration event. Speak with Baenfaeld at the Aftcastle, and convince him to answer the gazetteer's earnest questions.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

コリーズから、「星芒祭」実行委員の代表者に、取材に応じるよう伝えてほしいと依頼された。リムサ・ロミンサのアフトカースルにいる「ベーンフェールド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_02<tab>The troubled Baenfaeld explains that he would be glad to provide Collys with the details for her special edition if only they could first fix the old signal bell that is to be the main attraction. He asks that you speak with Hervey, the Adventurers' Guild's best goldsmith, and see how the repairs are progressing. Seek out the artisan near the Ruby Road Exchange in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_02<tab>ベーンフェールドと話した。「星芒祭」の催し物に使用予定の鐘が鳴らず困っているようだ。鐘の修理に協力するため、ウルダハのルビーロード国際市場付近にいる「エルヴェイ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_03<tab>You find Hervey just as he has determined the cause of the bell's refusal to clang. It seems that the clapper has rusted through, and the goldsmith laments that he has not the skills to forge a new one. Acquire a new iron clapper for the signal bell, then return to Hervey with the replacement part.

An <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>iron clapper<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be crafted using blacksmithing, or purchased from the market boards.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_03<tab>エルヴェイと話した。彼によれば、鐘を鳴らすには「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」が必要らしい。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」を調達し、ルビーロード国際市場付近の「エルヴェイ」に納品しよう。

※「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」は、鍛冶師が製作することができます。また、マーケットボードなどで購入することもできます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_04<tab>You deliver a replacement clapper to Hervey, and he immediately affixes the part. The melody he produces from the repaired bell, however, is not as festive as he had hoped. With the prompting of a passing little helper, the goldsmith decides to have you request a famous composer to modify the Ishgardian soldiers' tune into a more celebratory arrangement. Make your way to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre in Gridania, and present the signal bell and its accompanying sheet music to Cahernaut.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_04<tab>エルヴェイに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」を渡した。無事に鐘は鳴ったが奏でた曲は今ひとつのようだ。子どもたちが笑顔になる曲にするため、グリダニアのミィ・ケット野外音楽堂付近にいる「カヘルノ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C0C01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_05<tab>You place the bell and sheet music before the discerning eyes of Cahernaut, but the composer is unsure that even his genius can coax an appropriate tone from the signal bell's limited musical range. As you wonder what will become of the festival, you are paid an unexpected visit by a white-bearded man dressed as the Saint of Nymeia. The saint offers to work a seasonal miracle upon the bell, and, after a few moments of metalworking ministrations, hands the newly gleaming instrument back to Cahernaut. The composer, inspired by this display of goldsmithing prowess, soon has the bell's old song arranged into an enchanting melody. Return to Limsa Lominsa, and deliver the Starlight bell─and its rearranged sheet music─to Baenfaeld in East Hawkers' Alley.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_05<tab>カヘルノに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C0C01 /var>」を渡した。通りすがりの星神の聖人の協力もあり、編曲は上手く仕上がったようだ。さっそく、リムサ・ロミンサの東国際街商通りにいる「ベーンフェールド」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C0D01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_06<tab>You deliver the Starlight bell to an appreciative Baenfaeld. The contrite celebrant explains that although he has thrown out his original plans in favor of a more child-focused festival, his efforts to purchase wondrous decorations for the bell frame have his head spinning in confusion. Almost as if on cue, you are once more taken aback by an unexpected visit: four costumed little helpers appear, and offer their assistance with the preparations. Still reeling at the experience, Baenfaeld wonders if Hervey's shopping trip will be subject to a similar interruption. Find the goldsmith somewhere in Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_06<tab>ベーンフェールドに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C0D01 /var>」を渡した。どうやら彼は、今度は鐘楼の飾り付けに手こずっているらしい。そこに通りすがりの聖人の従者たちが現れ、協力を申し出てきた。同じく飾り付けの準備をしているエルヴェイのもとにも、聖人の従者が現れているかもしれない。リムサ・ロミンサで「エルヴェイ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_07<tab>You locate Hervey attempting to procure more decorations, and, as expected, you are visited by four more little helpers. Offering little chance to refuse, the costumed artisans take possession of the restored bell, and rush off to complete the centerpiece of the festival. Hurry back to the Aftcastle, and see what has become of the Starlight bell.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_07<tab>エルヴェイを探しだした。彼のもとにも聖人の従者たちが現れた。どうやら彼らは鐘楼の飾り付けを行うようだ。アフトカースルの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9EDE01 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_08<tab>By the time you return to the Aftcastle, it seems the little helpers' work is already done. The main bell has been returned to a beautifully decorated frame, and the jubilant melody that next rings forth has child and grown-up alike beaming with joy. Speak with Baenfaeld and share his thoughts on the celebration.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_08<tab>星芒祭の鐘楼は、すでに聖人の従者たちによって、煌びやかな様相となっていた。編曲された譜面に沿って星芒鐘が奏でる曲が、子どもたちを笑顔にしていく。アフトカースルの「ベーンフェールド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_09<tab>Baenfaeld thanks you again for all you have done, and expresses how glad he is that the festival was saved from the pompous event it threatened to become. The celebrant then assures you that he has promised to provide a full interview to Collys, and vows to continue bringing radiant smiles to the children of Eorzea. Go forth now and enjoy the rest of the Starlight Celebration!
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEQ_09<tab>ベーンフェールドと話した。星神の聖人や、多くの聖人の従者によって、子どもたちは笑顔になった。「ハーバーヘラルド」の記者コリーズも、無事にベーンフェールドに取材をできたようだ。時代の流れで変化し続ける文化そのものを守っていくことの、難しさや大切さを感じた祝祭となった。たくさんの人の想いと笑顔をのせた鐘の音とともに、まだまだ「星芒祭」は続いていく。引き続き「星芒祭」を楽しもう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_000<tab>Lovely to meet you! The name's Collys. I'm a reporter for the <var 1A 02 /var>Harbor Herald<var 1A 01 /var>, Limsa Lominsa's premier gazette. And let me tell you: no one is as excited as I am that the season for the Starlight Celebration has rolled around again!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_000<tab>ハーイ！　私、コリーズ！
リムサ・ロミンサの誇る情報誌「ハーバーヘラルド」の記者よ。
いよいよ、「星芒祭」の季節がやってきたわね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_001<tab>I don't know if you've heard, but my sources in the Adventurers' Guild tell me that the Starlight celebrant is planning an event that will resurrect a long-lost Starlight tradition! Doesn't that sound wonderful?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_001<tab>冒険者ギルドの広報部によれば、
今回の「星芒祭」は、今では失われてしまった、
かつての風習を蘇らせる催し物をやるのだとか！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_002<tab>I'd hoped to put together a special edition on the event...only, it seems there's been some kind of problem. And all the little helpers I've tried to interview have given me the vaguest of responses.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_002<tab>そこで、うちの雑誌でも特集を組もうと思ったんだけど、
何だか問題が起きているらしくて……
実行委員に取材をしても、微妙な返答ばかりなの。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_003<tab>You're in good standing with the Adventurers' Guild, aren't you? Fancy helping a reporter share the word on the happiest time of the year?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_003<tab>あなたも冒険者なら、冒険者ギルドに顔が利くでしょう？
ねぇ、協力してくれないかなぁ？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_004<tab>I need you to speak with Baenfaeld─he's this year's celebrant─and convince him to respond to my questions with definitive answers. You'll find him at the Aftcastle, making preparations for the festivities. Please, adventurer! I'll be ever so grateful!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_COLLYS_000_004<tab>「星芒祭」の実行委員の代表者は、「ベーンフェールド」さん。
アフトカースルで催しの準備をしているはずよ。
彼に取材に応じるよう伝えてくれると嬉しいわ！

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_010<tab>This ain't goin' well at all...
Eh? Need a word with me, do ye?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_010<tab>うーむ、困ったな……。
っと、お前さんは冒険者か、何のようだ？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_011<tab>...Aye, I know the lass ye speak of. Me bosses in the Adventurers' Guild told me a <var 1A 02 /var>Harbor Herald<var 1A 01 /var> reporter'd be around, an' that I was to answer all her questions. Seems she means to write up some special piece on the Starlight Celebration...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_011<tab>……ほう、「ハーバーヘラルド」の記者がねぇ。
確かに、趣向をこらした催し物をやるから取材に協力しろと、
冒険者ギルドの本部からお達しがあったがな。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_012<tab>I'd love to help her, I truly would─the event we're plannin' could use the publicity. But unless we sort out the bleedin' snag we've hit, there might not <var 1A 02 /var>be<var 1A 01 /var> any kinda event to write about.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_012<tab>情報誌に取り上げられるのは、こっちとしてもありがたい。
ただ、ちょっと問題が起きていて、それどころではないんだ。
それさえ片付けば、いくらでも協力するんだが……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_013<tab>...Here, ye look like a capable <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((bloke)) /var>. We could surely use another hand with the preparations, an' there'd be a reward in it for ye. Are you in?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_013<tab>そうだ、お前さん、ちょっと手伝ってもらえないか。
俺たちも助かる、お前さんも報酬を得られる……
どうだ、いい事ずくめだろ？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_020<tab>I expect ye already know the tale behind the festival, aye? Ishgardian soldiers lendin' their red jackets to wee freezin' orphans, an' all that?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_020<tab>……「星芒祭」の成り立ちは、もう知っているな？
その昔、イシュガルドの衛兵たちが戦災孤児を救うために、
緋色の外套を子どもたちに着せ、兵舎に招き入れたって話だ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_021<tab>Well, there's another part to the story what don't get told as often: afore the soldiers would set off to round up the younglin's, they would always play a special melody on their signal bells.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_021<tab>実は、これには逸話があってな。
衛兵たちは、子どもたちに声をかける際、
兵舎に備えられていた「起床鐘」に細工をして曲を奏でたらしい。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_022<tab>The sound o' them bells echoin' through the frigid night air was said to bring the biggest bloody smiles to them orphans─an' even a few hard-bitten veterans as well, I'd wager.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_022<tab>寒空に響く鐘の音は、寒空の下で凍える子どもたちに加え、
周囲の大人たちにも笑顔をあたえたという。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_023<tab>It's a damn shame, then, that that particular tradition weren't adopted into the celebration along with the crimson coats.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_023<tab>しかし、「星芒祭」が祝祭として定着するにともない、
この風習も失われていった……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_024<tab>Ever since the Calamity made a bloody mess of Eorzea, we've been doin' our best to put the place to rights. But the Garleans an' the beast tribes ain't makin' it easy for us, an' the unendin' flow o' refugees don't help matters neither.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_024<tab>第七霊災に見舞われながらも、エオルゼアは再び歩み始めた。
だが、ガレマール帝国や蛮族の脅威が消えた訳ではなく、
難民の流入は未だに続いている。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_025<tab>An' when all grown-ups do is frown an' grumble, it creates an atmosphere o' despair for the little ones. How often do ye see the younglin's truly <var 1A 02 /var>smilin'<var 1A 01 /var> these days, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_025<tab>大人たちが神経質になれば、それは子どもにも伝わるもんだ。
昨今の子どもたちからは、
真の笑顔が失われているように見えないか……？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_026<tab>That's why the Adventurers' Guild decided to do summat special this year.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_026<tab>そこで、俺たち冒険者ギルドが動き出したってわけだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_100_026<tab>It's time we resurrected an old custom to ring in the celebration, an' put some big bloody smiles back on folks' faces!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_100_026<tab>かつての鐘を鳴らすという風習を蘇らせ、
「星芒祭」を温かな鐘の音色とともに祝うことで、
少しでも多くの人を笑顔にするためにな！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_027<tab>The Temple Knights o' Ishgard was only too happy to dig up their old signal bells from where they was rustin' in some musty storehouse, an' then ship 'em here for the festival. No matter how much we cleaned an' oiled the main bell, though, we couldn't get the damn thing to ding, let alone dong.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_027<tab>……そう思い、北方のイシュガルドの神殿騎士団の協力を得て、
倉庫の奥底に眠っていた鐘を見つけて搬送してもらったのだが、
この鐘が、どんなに整備しても鳴らなくてな……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_028<tab>The guild's coffers was all but emptied for this event, an' the Admiral's gone an' invited a bunch o' high-an'-mighty dignitaries to attend the openin' ceremony. We can't <var 1A 02 /var>afford<var 1A 01 /var> to fail...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_028<tab>この催し物には、かなりの予算を突っ込んでいる……。
それに式典には、来賓にメルウィブ提督も招いているんだ。
失敗はできないってのに……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_029<tab>Ye'll see this through to the end, though, won't ye? Get that bell to ring, an' I promise I'll talk that reporter's bloody ears off on any subject she cares to name.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_029<tab>お前さん、同じ冒険者の仲間だと思って助けてくれないか。
鐘さえ鳴れば、いくらでも取材を受けるからよ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_100_029<tab>First, ye'll need to head to Ul'dah. Track down Hervey─he's the guild's top goldsmith─an' see how things is comin' along with the bell repairs.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_100_029<tab>ギルド本部でも指折りの彫金師である「エルヴェイ」って奴が、
今、ウルダハで鐘を修理しているんだ。
奴の様子を見てきてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_030<tab>...You're <var 29 EB02 /var>? Uh-huh. So, is that supposed to impress me, or─ Oh! You must be the <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((bloke)) /var> Baenfaeld mentioned. Well, your timing couldn't be better.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_030<tab>ああ、君は……？
なるほど、ベーンフェールドさんが寄こした助っ人ですね？
ちょうどよかった、ようやく鐘が鳴らない原因がわかったんです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_031<tab>I just removed the bell's clapper, you see, and was surprised at how light it was. When I took a closer look, I realized that its middle had been eaten away by rust...which explains why no amount of adjusting or oiling could give the bell a satisfying clang.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_031<tab>鐘の内側に「クラッパー」という部品があるのですが、
こいつの芯が腐食していて、ボロボロになっていたんですよ。
どうりで鐘を調整しても、音が鳴らないわけです……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_032<tab>The problem is, I haven't the slightest idea of how to forge a new one─that's a job for a smitty, not a goldsmith. I suppose we'll just have to ask around, and see what we can find.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_032<tab>問題なのは、「クラッパー」の製作には鍛冶の知識が必要で、
彫金師である僕には、手に負えないってことです……。
こうなったら、手当たり次第に探すしかありませんね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_033<tab>Do you know anyone who can craft an iron clapper? Get your hands on one, and I'll tell Baenfaeld to dig a bit deeper for your reward. Meanwhile, I'll try my luck with the local merchants...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_033<tab>君、いっしょに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」を探してくれませんか？
報酬は、ベーンフェールドさんに言って上乗せしてもらいます。
僕は知り合いの商人を当たってみますね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>An <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>iron clapper<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be crafted using blacksmithing, or purchased from the market boards.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」は、鍛冶師が製作することができます。
また、マーケットボードなどで購入することもできます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_500_020<tab>Get yerself to Ul'dah an' find Hervey, our guild's best goldsmith. Give him whatever help he needs to fix that bell!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_500_020<tab>ギルド本部でも指折りの彫金師である「エルヴェイ」って奴が、
今、ウルダハで鐘を修理しているんだ。
奴の様子を見てきてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_040<tab><sigh> None of my usual merchant contacts seem to deal in bell parts. I wonder if it's too late to commission a blacksmith...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_040<tab>……知り合いの商人も扱ってないか。
この鐘に合う「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」……。
どこかで手に入ればいいけど。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_041<tab>You've brought me a clapper!? But where did you─ Never mind, let's attach it to the signal bell right away!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_041<tab>おお、これは「<var 28 ((Item)) F2359E01 /var>」じゃないですか！
すごい、どうやって手に入れたんです！？
と、とにかく、さっそく鐘に取り付けて鳴らしてみましょう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_050<tab>Well, it certainly sounds like a bell now, doesn't it? It's just that this melody is rather... Hmmm. Could I be reading the music wrong?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_050<tab>うむむ……鐘が鳴ったのはいいけど……。
なんだろう、この曲であってるのでしょうか？
……楽譜はこれで間違いないんですが。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_051<tab>You there! What was that song ye were playin' on that bell?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_051<tab>……ねぇ、そこの貴方。
今の鐘の音は、どこの曲なのかしら？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_052<tab>Well, well, if it isn't one of the saint's little helpers. That was a tune we were taught by the knights of Ishgard─we're attempting to reenact an old tradition for this year's Starlight Celebration, you see.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_052<tab>これはこれは、聖人の従者さま。
今回の「星芒祭」で、かつての逸話を再現しようと、
イシュガルドから古い鐘とともに、楽譜を取り寄せたんです。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_053<tab>This was once a signal bell for an Ishgardian barracks, and we've only just restored it to working order. As you may have noticed, however, the melody isn't quite <var 1A 02 /var>festive<var 1A 01 /var> enough.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_053<tab>この鐘は、元は兵舎の「起床鐘」だったらしく、
整備が終わって、ようやく鳴ったところなのですが……。
お聞きのとおり、どうにもピンとこない曲でして。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_054<tab>Let me ask ye a question, lad: what exactly are ye ringin' this bell for?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_054<tab>「星芒祭」の催し物のことなら伺ってるけど……。
貴方、この鐘を何のために鳴らそうとしているの？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_055<tab>Why, to make this year's Starlight Celebration a resounding success, of course! The Adventurers' Guild has spent a veritable fortune on festival preparations, and failure is simply unacceptable.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_055<tab>それはもちろん、「星芒祭」を成功させるためですよ。
今回は、冒険者ギルドとしても、かなりの予算を投入しています。
決して失敗はできませんからね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_056<tab>...I knew it. And what is the Starlight Celebration supposed to be for, then, hm? Is it for the prestige o' the bloody <var 1A 02 /var>Adventurers' Guild<var 1A 01 /var>? ...Or is it for the happiness o' younglin's all across Eorzea?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_056<tab>……やっぱりね。
「星芒祭」は、誰のための祝祭なのかしら。
冒険者ギルドのため？　それとも、子どもたちのため？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_057<tab>I... That is to say...
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_057<tab>あっ……そ、それは…………。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_058<tab>Now, I'm barely half an artisan myself, but even I can see that ye've done a nice job o' restorin' an old signal bell to its original state. But maybe ye've let yerself get carried away by yer desire to resurrect the past.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_058<tab>私もクラフターの端くれだけど、この鐘はよく整備されていて、
忠実に「起床鐘」を復元してあるように見えるわ。
ただ、そっちにばかり気を取られすぎていないかしら。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_059<tab>Over the years, the Starlight Celebration has grown into a festival with the sole purpose o' bringin' joy to children. Maybe this bell ringin' custom o' yers needs some adjustment, as well, to match the era into which it's bein' reborn.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_059<tab>「星芒祭」は時代とともに、子どもたちの祝祭として定着した。
だったらその鐘も、「起床鐘」から祭器に……
「星芒祭の鐘」に変わる時が来ているのかもしれないわね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_061<tab>...You're absolutely right. Somewhere along the way, we lost sight of the true meaning of the celebration. The spectacle became more important than the happiness it was intended to create...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_061<tab>……確かに我々は、いつのまにか、
子どもたちを笑顔にするという当初の目的を忘れ、
「星芒祭」を成功させることに躍起になっていたようです……。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_062<tab>But that ends right here! We'll turn this prideful mess into the joyous festival it was meant to be! Somehow!
...A little help, little helper?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_062<tab>ですが、エオルゼアを取り巻く不安定な状況のなか、
子どもたちに真の笑顔を取り戻したい気持ちは変わりません！
聖人の従者さま、いったいどうすればよろしいでしょうか。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_063<tab>Ah, ye silly oaf! Must I do all the thinkin' for ye? All ye need do is take that tired old melody and add a little magic─make of it a spell what enchants the ears and brings a smile to a younglin's face.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_000_063<tab>その気持ちがあるなら実行に移すだけよ。
たとえば、ピンとこないこの曲に、
子どもたちが笑顔になる魔法をかけてあげるとかね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_100_063<tab>You there. Lend this dolt a hand if he needs one.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_100_063<tab>そこの冒険者さん。
貴方も協力してあげてね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_101_063<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Lend this dolt a hand, would ye? I'd feel better knowin' ye were involved.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_JULYAN_101_063<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
アンタが付いているなら安心だよ。
協力してあげてね！

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_064<tab>Add a little magic to the melody...
I think I understand. But we'll need someone as can make it more festive without completely overshadowing the original tune.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_064<tab>この曲に、笑顔になる魔法を……。
そうか、原曲の雰囲気を壊さずに、
子どもたちも聞きやすいようにしてもらえれば！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_065<tab>And I know just the man to do it! Cahernaut's the composer for a famous orchestra, and they're in Gridania right now for the celebrations─take the bell and the sheet music to him, and see if he's willing to come up with a new arrangement for the song.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_065<tab>そうだ、有名なグリダニア管弦楽団に協力を頼もう！
君は、この鐘と楽譜を持って、楽団員の「カヘルノ」さんに会い、
「星芒祭」向けの編曲を依頼してきてもらえませんか！？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_066<tab>I'll head back to Baenfaeld, and we'll figure out how to include more younglings in the audience.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_066<tab>僕はベーンフェールドさんのところに戻り、
より多くの子どもたちを集めることができないか、
話を持ちかけてみます。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_067<tab>Contacting all the orphanages in the realm and inviting them to Limsa Lominsa for the performance should make for a good start. To the hells with the budget!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_067<tab>各地の孤児院に声をかけてリムサ・ロミンサに招き、
鐘の音を聞いてもらうんです！
採算なんて度外視ですとも！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_500_030<tab>Get yerself to Ul'dah an' find Hervey, our guild's best goldsmith. Give him whatever help he needs to fix that bell!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_500_030<tab>ギルド本部でも指折りの彫金師である「エルヴェイ」って奴が、
今、ウルダハで鐘を修理しているんだ。
奴の様子を見てきてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_070<tab>Yes, I am Cahernaut. Yes, <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> Cahernaut. The orchestra is not presently accepting applicants, so if you would kindly─ Hm?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_070<tab>ええ、確かに私はグリダニア管弦楽団の者ですが……
何のようですかな？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_071<tab>...And you would have me rearrange this into a less dreary melody? <sigh> Very well. Anything for <var 1A 02 /var>the children<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_071<tab>……なるほど、この鐘で奏でる曲の編曲を。
いいでしょう、子どもたちのためなら喜んで協力しますとも。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_072<tab>I am afraid, however, that the signal bell is not a particularly versatile instrument. There is little even the great Cahernaut can achieve with such a limited musical scale...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_072<tab>ですが、この鐘は、元が「起床鐘」だけあって、
奏でられる音階に、限度があるようですね。
もう少し、音階の幅が広ければよいのですが……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_080<tab>(-???-)Oho, then mayhap that bell is overdue for the gentle touch of innovation!
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_080<tab>(-？？？？-)ホウ、でしたら、私に任せてもらえませんかな？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_081<tab>Ah, if it isn't the Saint of Nymeia himself.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_081<tab>これはこれは、星神の聖人さま。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_082<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)I overheard your little dilemma, and it just so happens that I have some small skill with goldsmithing. If it is extra notes you need, then it is extra notes you shall have!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_082<tab>(-星神の聖人-)ハッハッハ、私も少しだけ彫金の腕に覚えがありましてな。
その程度なら、朝飯前のスクワット前！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_083<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)It's hammer time!
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_083<tab>(-星神の聖人-)ゴールドスミス、イノベーーーーーーーションッ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_084<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)Crafting miracles is the Mander...er, Starlight way!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_084<tab>(-星神の聖人-)マンダ……スターライト・イノベイティブタァァァァァッチ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_085<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)A masterpiece to brighten your Starlight day!♪
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_085<tab>(-星神の聖人-)超級作業で仕上げですぞっ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_086<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)See how it shines! See how it glimmers! And if it doesn't produce the sweetest of sounds, then I shall eat my Starlight hat!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_086<tab>(-星神の聖人-)ピッカピッカ！　ツールツール！　ハッハッハ！
どうですかな？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_087<tab>Th-The richness of the timbre is inexplicable! Its ringing reverberations will enthrall both adults and younglings alike!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_087<tab>ななな、なんて豊かな音色でしょう！
こ、これなら、子どもたちだけでなく、
大人たちも笑顔にできる曲が奏でられますよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_088<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)It's an old bell, to be sure, but the restoration work was impeccable.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_088<tab>(-星神の聖人-)古い鐘ですが、よく整備されていましたからな。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_100_088<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)The new clapper... That was your doing? It certainly made my task far simpler than I anticipated.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_100_088<tab>(-星神の聖人-)……ふむ、わかりますぞ。
真新しい「クラッパー」は、キミが用意したものですな？
あれのおかげで、思ったよりも簡単でしたぞ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_101_088<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)The new clapper... That was your doing, wasn't it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? It certainly made my task far simpler than I anticipated.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_101_088<tab>(-星神の聖人-)……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、わかりますぞ。
真新しい「クラッパー」は、キミが用意したものですな？
あれのおかげで、思ったよりも簡単でしたぞ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_089<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)Well, I'm glad that this humble wandering pilgrim could be of service! Mayhap we shall meet again someday! Ho ho ho!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_089<tab>(-星神の聖人-)さて、私は通りすがりの、ただの星神の聖人……
またいつか、会うことも有りましょう。
ホッホッホゥ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_090<tab>I shall begin work on the new arrangement immediately. The saint's genius has called to my own...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_090<tab>では、さっそく編曲にとりかかりましょう。
しばらくお待ちください。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_091<tab>...And it is done! Pray convey these masterpieces─both the reworked bell and my Starlight melody─to your colleagues in Limsa Lominsa. Your audience shall be enchanted, I assure you!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_000_091<tab>……さぁ、できましたよ。
新しい鐘とともに、リムサ・ロミンサに届けてあげてください。
子どもたちの笑顔、楽しみにしていますよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_092<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)Hmmm. An acceptable result, but not enough flair for my taste. Time to dust off the linkpearl and make some calls...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_092<tab>(-星神の聖人-)ふむ、もう少し何か欲しいところですな。
……うむ、彼らに任せるとしましょうか。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_500_040<tab>I heard word from Hervey. So, we're to call more younglin's to Limsa, now? I just hope this don't end in disaster...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_500_040<tab>……エルヴェイから聞いたぞ。
子どもたちを集めるだけ集めるんだって？
も、問題が変わってきたな……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_500_040<tab>Take the newly refurbished bell─and my masterfully rearranged melody, of course─to Limsa Lominsa and your waiting colleagues. The children are in for a treat this year!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_CAHERNAUT_500_040<tab>新しい鐘とともに、リムサ・ロミンサに届けてあげてください。
子どもたちの笑顔、楽しみにしていますよ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Hervey told me everythin' what happened, an' I decided to do some extra shoppin' for the festival while I was waitin' for ye to get back.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_100<tab>おお、冒険者か！
エルヴェイから事のあらましを聞いてな。
居ても立っても居られず、買い出しに来たところだ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_101<tab>...Ah, so this is the new an' improved bell─an' a newly arranged melody to boot. Ye've been more help than I deserved, all things considered.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_101<tab>……ふむふむ、これが新しい鐘と新しい楽譜か。
確かに受け取った。
いろいろと手間を掛けさせたようだな、感謝するぞ。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_102<tab>Hervey's tale opened me eyes to what proud clods we've been...
I've already been in contact with the Admiral about cancelin' that overblown openin' ceremony, an' she took me explanation with good grace.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_102<tab>エルヴェイから話を聞いたあと反省してな。
メルウィブ提督には、この催し物の式典中止の連絡を入れたんだ。
理由を告げたら、快く承諾してくださったよ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_103<tab>It's time we started thinkin' with our hearts, an' not our bleedin' coinpurses! We'll throw the best damn Starlight Celebration these little ones have ever seen!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_103<tab>これからは、心を入れ替えて、
子どもたちに真の笑顔を取り戻すため精進するぞ！
冒険者ギルドの魂ってやつをみせてやるさ！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_110<tab>Thanks to you, we've got the bell an' the song sorted. Now we just need to do summat about that borin' old metal frame...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_110<tab>……さて、お前さんのおかげで、鐘と曲は何とかなった。
あとは鐘楼だけか……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_111<tab>That's actually what brought me here to the markets. I was lookin' to decorate the bell frame, and make it a proper part o' the festivities.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_111<tab>実は、ここに買い出しに来たのも、
鐘楼に「星芒祭」らしい飾り付けをして、
少しでも子どもたちを喜ばせようと思ってな。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_112<tab>But I'm afraid I've less sense for choosin' decorations than a blind Sahagin.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_112<tab>だが、俺にはこういった知識はないし、
何を買っていいのかさっぱりで困ってたんだ。
やれやれ、どうしたもんかな。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GEVA_000_113<tab>(-???-)Ah, now I understand why our assistance was required.
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GEVA_000_113<tab>(-？？？？-)なるほど、そういうことだったのね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SERENDIPITY_000_114<tab>(-???-)If our task is to put smiles on little faces, then they shall be the widest smiles they can possibly be!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SERENDIPITY_000_114<tab>(-？？？？-)せっかく、子どもたちを笑顔にするなら、
これ以上ないってくらい、笑顔にさせなきゃですね！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_115<tab>But... Yer all guildmasters, ain't ye!?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_115<tab>あ、あんたらは……。
もも、もしや、クラフターギルドのマスターたち！？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_REDOLENTROSE_000_116<tab>Ohohoho! Surely you jest, good sir! We are merely the saint's little helpers, wandering the land in search of good deeds to perform.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_REDOLENTROSE_000_116<tab>知らないわねぇ。
私たちは通りすがりの、ただの聖人の従者よ？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BRITHAEL_000_117<tab>It were the saint himself what set us on this task, though. Seems ye could use a hand with some decoratin', eh?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BRITHAEL_000_117<tab>星神の聖人さまの呼びかけで参上したのです。
僕たちに、少しだけ協力してほしいって。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GEVA_000_118<tab>Fortunately, we all have a certain amount of experience with such things. You just leave it to us.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GEVA_000_118<tab>そういうことさ。
まぁ、任せておくれよ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_119<tab>Wh-What in the seven hells just happened...?
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_119<tab>なんか、とんでもないことになってきたな……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_120<tab>Ye know, I sent Hervey off on a shoppin' errand o' his own... Ye don't suppose them “little helpers” will track him down as well, will they? Let's go check on him─the poor, unsuspectin' bugger!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_120<tab>待てよ、エルヴェイにも、
同じように買い出しを頼んでいたんだ。
まさか、あっちにも現れるとか……行ってみよう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_REDOLENTROSE_500_050<tab>...How unusual for that bearded eccentric to call upon us for help. Well, I suppose I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> an expert in the prettifying department. Mayhap Serendipity will wish to coordinate colors...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_REDOLENTROSE_500_050<tab>……あの方からの依頼だなんて、珍しいこともあるものね。
それにしても、飾り付けをねぇ。
セレンディピティーちゃんにも相談してみようかしら。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SERENDIPITY_500_052<tab>Hmmm. We'll need a decorative design that, while tastefully extravagant, serves to draw all eyes to the main attraction. I wonder if Severian has any ideas...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SERENDIPITY_500_052<tab>……主役を引き立てるための飾り付け。
ふふ、あの方も、なかなか楽しそうなご提案をされますね。
セヴェリアンさんなら、何かアイディアを持っているかも！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEVERIAN_500_056<tab>What part of “critical juncture in my research” does that persistent patrician fail to understand? <sigh> I suppose I should indulge in one of those “breaks” Deitrich is always insisting I take. Now, where is that linkpearl Redolent Rose gave me...?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEVERIAN_500_056<tab>……やれやれ、研究で忙しいというのに、あの方ときたら。
ま、たまには息抜きで付き合ってやろう。
レドレント・ローズにも連絡しておいてやるか。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GEVA_500_051<tab>...What an unexpected request. Decoration is not my usual area of expertise, but I'll make an exception in this case. What does Beatin think of all this, I wonder...?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GEVA_500_051<tab>……あの方からなんて、珍しい依頼も来たものだわ。
アタシのガラじゃないけど、せっかくの機会だしね。
そうだ、ベアティヌにも声をかけておかないと。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BEATINE_500_054<tab>Hmph, this is so typical of him. How he extolls wood's finer qualities when he has need of my assistance. I assume Geva has experienced a similar overture...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BEATINE_500_054<tab>……フフフフ、あの方も素直じゃない。
木が好きならそうおっしゃってくれればいいのに……。
さて、ゲヴァさんにも伝えておかなければ……。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BRITHAEL_500_051<tab>A request from one o' the best in the business...
I'd best have a drink to settle me nerves, then ask H'naanza how she means to handle this.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BRITHAEL_500_051<tab>……ああ、あの方からの依頼だなんて、緊張して胃が。
ハ・ナンザさんにも協力してもらわないと……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_LYNGSATH_500_053<tab>It's nice o' the old buzzard to include me, but 'ow am I meant to contribute? By makin' a meal what Brithael's churnin' innards can keep down? Ha! Well, I'm sure there'll be a way to make use o' me skills...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_LYNGSATH_500_053<tab>……あの方から依頼を受けたのはいいが、何をすればいいんだ？
まぁ、楽しそうだしいくらでも協力するけどな。
とりあえず、ブリサエルのために胃に優しい飯でも作ってやるか。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HNAANZA_500_055<tab>Aiding with these decorations shall prove an interesting challenge. Did he contact us all? Lyngsath must find this amusing...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HNAANZA_500_055<tab>……飾り付けとは、なかなか面白い依頼だよ。
あの方も、なかなかイキなことをなさる。
となると、リングサスにも話が来ているんだろうね。

source:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_140<tab>Bah, I thought this would be the perfect place to pick up something exotic and interesting for the decorations, but there's naught to be found...
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What are you doing here?
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HERVEY_000_140<tab>ここに来れば、異国の珍しい飾りが手に入るかと思ったんだけど、
うーん、見つからないなぁ……。
……あれ、冒険者さん、どうしました？

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_LYNGSATH_000_150<tab>(-???-)Leave it to an expert in procurin' rare ingredients, lad. I've already spoken with the 'arbormaster an' secured a box o' wonders from distant shores.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_LYNGSATH_000_150<tab>(-？？？？-)やれやれ、探し方が下手なんじゃねぇか。
異国の珍しい飾りなら、ちゃんとあったぞ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_151<tab>More guildmasters!? Yer <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> in on it!
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_151<tab>や、やっぱり、クラフターギルドのマスターたち！！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEVERIAN_000_152<tab>Guildmasters? Where? I see only little helpers.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_SEVERIAN_000_152<tab>……さて、誰のことかな。
私たちは通りすがりの、ただの聖人の従者だが。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HNAANZA_000_153<tab>You'll not find much when your objective is so hazy. Narrow your focus, and consider what it is the client truly desires.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HNAANZA_000_153<tab>闇雲に探したってダメさ。
商品を見たり使ったりする相手の心……
それを想いながら探さないとね。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BEATINE_000_154<tab>It would be best if you entrust that bell to us, child.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BEATINE_000_154<tab>……では、その鐘を先生たちに渡していただきましょうか。
フフフ……フフフフフ……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HNAANZA_000_155<tab>Fear not: we'll take care of everything!
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_HNAANZA_000_155<tab>あとのことは、私たちに任せておきな！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_156<tab>Am I dreamin', or was our final task just taken over by the master artisans o' three different city<var 1F /var>states? I've got to see this for meself! Quick, back to the Aftcastle!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_156<tab>まさか、あの人ら、鐘楼に飾り付けをするつもりじゃ……
い、急いでいってみよう！！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_160<tab>By the gods! It's beautiful!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_160<tab>こ、これは……！
ステキな飾り付けがされてるじゃないか！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GUIDEXMSCHILD_000_161<tab>(-Orphan Boy-)It were amazin'! A gang o' little helpers came rushin' in like the wind, and done them bells up pretty afore I could even blink! I ain't never seen nothin' like it!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GUIDEXMSCHILD_000_161<tab>(-孤児の少年-)ぼく、みてたよ！
聖者の従者さまが大勢駆けつけて、一瞬でキレイにしたんだ！
それはもう、すごかったんだから！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_162<tab>I should've expected naught less from the guildmas─ Er, the saint's little helpers. I'll be sure to thank them all...
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_162<tab>さすが、クラフターギルドマスターたち……
いや、聖者の従者さまだ。
感謝しないとな……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_163<tab>What say ye, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Shall we ring in the celebration? Let's light up the face of every child from here to the harbor!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_163<tab>よし、冒険者。
今こそ、鐘を鳴らそう！
子どもたちを笑顔にする鐘の音を響かせよう！

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_164<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)It's important to preserve the past...
target: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_164<tab>(-星神の聖人-)昔のものを守り続けることだけが大切ではない……。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_165<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)But it's the culture and customs that grow and thrive with the passage of time that are truly history's treasures. That's what sings to people's hearts.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_165<tab>(-星神の聖人-)時代に合わせて変わっていく中で、その文化自体を守ることが、
何よりも大切なことなのです。
なぜなら、そこには、心があるのですから。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_166<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)Ho ho ho! I'm sure the Ishgardians who began this tradition of giving would be pleased with the joy the Starlight Celebration continues to bring.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_GODBERT_000_166<tab>(-星神の聖人-)ホッホッホ、「星芒祭」の由来となったイシュガルドの兵士も、
きっとそれを望んでいることでしょう。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_170<tab>I have to thank ye again for all ye've done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ye've helped steer us back to the road we ought to have been walkin' in the first place.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_170<tab>お前さんには、本当に世話になった。
俺たちも、大切なことを思い出すことができたよ。
まったく、感謝してもしきれない。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_171<tab>Speakin' o' which, that reporter from the <var 1A 02 /var>Harbor Herald<var 1A 01 /var> sends her thanks as well. I've promised her a full interview at her earliest convenience.
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_171<tab>そういや、最初の依頼……
情報誌「ハーバーヘラルド」の取材も受けておいたからな。
あの記者のねーちゃんも、お前さんに感謝してたぜ。

source: TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_172<tab>Meanwhile, I've more younglin's to delight with that enchantin' melody. Mark me words, I'll have the whole bloody realm smilin' afore this festival's done!
target:
TEXT_FESXMS101_02224_BAENFAELD_000_172<tab>さてと、もっと子どもたちを呼んでこないとな。
お前さんががんばって用意してくれたこの鐘と曲で、
エオルゼア中を笑顔にしてみせるさ！
